mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, CDMC AS LABEL, SJCD AS PARENTNODEID, 'MENU' TYPE, CDXH AS XH FROM TB_CDXX WHERE TB_CDXX.SYBZ = 1 AND TB_CDXX.JLYXZT = 1 UNION SELECT 1 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, GNMC AS LABEL, CDXX_ZJID AS PARENTNODEID, 'FUNC' TYPE, GNXH AS XH FROM TB_GNXX T1 WHERE T1.Sybz = 1 AND T1.JLYXZT = 1 AND T1.CDXX_ZJID IN (SELECT ZJID FROM TB_CDXX WHERE TB_CDXX.SYBZ = '1' AND TB_CDXX.JLYXZT = '1') and EXISTS (SELECT T2.GNXX_ZJID FROM TB_JSXX_R_GNXX T2 WHERE T1.ZJID = T2.GNXX_ZJID AND T2.JSXX_ZJID = #{roleId}) UNION SELECT 0 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, GNMC AS LABEL, CDXX_ZJID AS PARENTNODEID, 'FUNC' TYPE, GNXH AS XH FROM TB_GNXX T1 WHERE T1.Sybz = 1 AND T1.JLYXZT = 1 AND T1.CDXX_ZJID IN (SELECT ZJID FROM TB_CDXX WHERE TB_CDXX.SYBZ = 1 AND TB_CDXX.JLYXZT = '1') and NOT EXISTS (SELECT T2.GNXX_ZJID FROM TB_JSXX_R_GNXX T2 WHERE T1.ZJID = T2.GNXX_ZJID AND T2.JSXX_ZJID = #{roleId})) A order by XH ASC
